xmpp.PersonalEvent

type
class
available in
neko, js, flash, php, node
Abstract base for personal event classes. The implementing class HAS TO HAVE a static XMLNS field (required by the jabber.PersonalEventListener)!

Instance Variables

nodeName(default,null) : String

xmlns(default,null) : String

Instance Methods

empty() : Xml

Returns a empty XML node for disabling the personal event.

getNode() : String

Returns the (subclass) namespace.

toXml() : Xml
